settings.heading: FOR YOUR LOVED ONE
settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.heading: For Women
settings.text: For the woman who wants to feel empowered and beautiful, our new eau de toilette is a perfect choice, with a blend of floral and woody notes, this fragrance is both elegant and modern. Whether they’re getting ready for a night out or just want to feel special, our Eau de toilette is sure to make you feel like the best version of yourself, and with its universal appeal, this fragrance is great for everyone, no matter their personal taste or style, with the bonus of having the engraved message on the bottle, brilliant this will continue to remind that special person of this unique gift.

settings.heading: For Men
settings.text: For the man who wants to feel confident and charismatic, try our new Eau de toilette. With a unique blend of citrus and spicy notes, this fragrance is perfect for any occasion. Whether they're at the office or out with friends, this scent will leave a lasting impression that’s sure to turn heads, our Eau de toilette is perfect for everyone, regardless of age or style, with the bonus of having the engraved message on the bottle, fantastic this will continue to remind that special person of this unique gift.
